description:
You don’t become the San Francisco district attorney by being a “moderate.” And the left knows that, that’s why the media is doing PR damage control and trying to alter history and act like she wasn't the “most liberal senator” in Congress. The woman is more progressive than Joe Biden and just like the media acted like he was centrist, they are trying to gaslight Americans into believing she hasn't even so much as inched left of center.

But the Donald Trump campaign has the receipts.

MUST WATCH: New ad from @realDonaldTrump:

"Meet San Francisco Liberal Kamala Harris"

This is an absolutely devastating ad highlighting just how radical Kamala Harris truly is.
title: Watch: Donald Trump unleashes FIRE new campaign ad that Kamala Harris (and the media) will hate

There is no reason Harley-Davidson should be incorporating racist, DEI initiatives and holding gay boot camps, especially because they sell motorcycles. But the people in charge refuse to read the room and the anti-woke mob may or may not start doing its thing.

Harley-Davidson was probably one of the last companies you would have expected to jump on the woke bandwagon, but just like how Bud Light and Tractor Supply don’t care about funding things and movements that despise the majority of their consumer base, the same holds for Harley.
title: Harley-Davidson Has Gone Woke, Now Hosts LGBTQ+ Boot Camps

description:
A lawyer who works near the capital did what any true patriot would do when seeing a bunch of unhinged leftists burn the American flag, which is to grab the flag that has become engulfed in flames and run.

As everyone knows, pro-Hamas agitators don’t do much of anything beneficial and thrive off chaos, which is what they did in our nation’s capital yesterday, as they bowed down to a terrorist organization that uses them as “useful idiots.”

A man saves a smoldering American flag from the center of the protest and is nearly tackled amidst shouts “get him!” pic.twitter.com/ZHexsEZbak

title: Watch: Amidst the pro-Hamas progressives, a hero tries to save a burning American Flag

title: Watch: Devastating mash-up about "border czar" Kamala Harris shows as much as you hate the media, it's not enough
